jsock.net

Class MessageSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsock.net.JSocket
      • jsock.net.MessageSocket
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileTransferSocket, ObjectSocket

    public class MessageSocket
extends JSocket
    Created by czifro on 12/29/14. A wrapper for Socket connection, can send and receive Strings
    Version:
    0.1.2
    Author:
    Will Czifro
